meta.name: description
meta.content: LEARN is a network of high-performing, PK-8, tuition-free public charter schools in Chicago, North Chicago and Waukegan. LEARN instills the academic foundation and ambition to earn a college degree in all students.

LEARN is a network of high-performing, PK-8, tuition-free public charter schools in Chicago, North Chicago and Waukegan. LEARN instills the academic foundation and ambition to earn a college degree in all students.

alert-banner.message:
All LEARN schools are closed for the remainder of our school year which ends on June 19, 2020.

Click here for the latest coronavirus updates.

Click here to donate to the LEARN Family Fund.
alert-banner.headline: View Important Message

div.span: At LEARN, our scholars are college-bound scholars.
div.div: Attending a LEARN public elementary school is putting your child on the path to college. We provide an exceptional learning experience and optimize student achievement through the twin pillars of academic rigor and social-emotional support.

div.p: of LEARN campuses outperform the neighborhood and zoned public schools

img.span: illustrated map of Illinois and Washington D.C.

div.div: LEARN is a network of high-performing, tuition-free public charter schools. We have 10 schools that serve over 4,000 scholars in Chicago, North Chicago, Waukegan and Washington D.C. (coming soon).
